title: My Daughter Put Me in My Place
description:
Kim reads Dr. Laura the angry letter she received from her adult daughter, outlining the ways Kim and her husband are overbearing and driving her and their grandchildren away. - Dr. Laura: "The only apology they likely would accept is; 'you are right!'"

Do you still try to parent your grown children? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
